TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ClientIDMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 ASP.NET 如何針對可在用戶端指令碼中存取的控制項產生 。

span.span: Specifies how ASP.NET generates the for a control that can be accessed in client script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用列舉當您設定控制項的屬性。You use the enumeration when you set the property for a control. 您指派給值屬性會決定如何產生屬性。The value that you assign to the property determines how the property is generated. 值屬性呈現為`id`屬性標記，並為您用來從用戶端指令碼存取控制項的值。The value of the property is rendered as the `id` attribute in markup, and it is the value that you use to access the control from client script. 您指派給值屬性不會影響伺服器控制項，僅屬性`id`相對應的 HTML 項目的屬性。The value that you assign to the property does not affect the property of the server control, only the `id` attribute of the corresponding HTML element. 預設值頁面是可預測。The default value of for a page is Predictable. 預設值控制項為繼承。The default value of for a control is Inherit. 因為控制項的預設值是繼承，此預設產生模式為可預測。Because the default for controls is Inherit, the default generation mode is Predictable. （不過，如果您使用 Visual Studio Web 專案轉換至 ASP.NET 4，從較早版本時，Visual Studio 會自動設定網站預設要 AutoID Web.config 檔案中。）(However, if you use Visual Studio to convert a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the site default to AutoID in the Web.config file.) 您可以設定`ClientIDMode`網站設定網站的 Web.config 檔中的項目中的所有頁面的值。You can set the `ClientIDMode` value for all pages in a Web site by setting the element in the site's Web.config file. 您可以設定`ClientIDMode`頁面指示詞中的值。You can set the `ClientIDMode` value for a page in the directive. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ASP.NET 網頁伺服器控制項識別](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7). ## Examples 下列範例所示控制項中所包含的控制項。The following example shows controls that are contained in a control. 在控制項，屬性設定為可預測和屬性設定為`ProductID`。On the control, the property is set to Predictable and the property is set to `ProductID`. 從用戶端指令碼，您可以存取的特定執行個體根據`ProductID`您嘗試存取執行個體的值。From client script, you can access a particular instance of a based on the `ProductID` value of the instance that you are trying to access. 這個範例會使用三個建立 HTML`ProductIDLabel`控制項。This example creates HTML with three `ProductIDLabel` controls. 頁面執行時，控制項的 Id 將如下所示：When the page runs, the IDs for the controls will be the following: - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_1` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_34` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_43` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項的識別碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode AutoID = int32(1)

summary.span: 值是透過串連每個父命名容器的 值與控制項的 值產生。

span.span: The value is generated by concatenating the values of each parent naming container with the value of the control.

summary.span: 在呈現控制項之多個執行個體的資料繫結情節中，遞增值會插入控制項之 值的前面。

span.span: In data-binding scenarios where multiple instances of a control are rendered, an incrementing value is inserted in front of the control's value.

summary.span: 各區段是以底線字元 (_) 分隔。

span.span: Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).

summary.span: 這是唯一可在比 ASP.NET 4 還舊的版本中使用的演算法。

span.span: This algorithm is the only one that was available in versions of ASP.NET earlier than ASP.NET 4.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode Inherit = int32(0)

summary.span: 此控制項會繼承其 控制項的 設定。

span.span: The control inherits the setting of its control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode Predictable = int32(2)

summary.span: 這個演算法用於資料繫結控制項中的控制項。

span.span: This algorithm is used for controls that are in data-bound controls.

summary.span: 值是透過串連父命名容器的 值與控制項的 值產生。

span.span: The value is generated by concatenating the value of the parent naming container with the value of the control.

summary.span: 如果控制項是資料繫結控制項，並且會產生多個資料列，則 屬性中指定之資料欄位的值會加入結尾處。

span.span: If the control is a data-bound control that generates multiple rows, the value of the data field specified in the property is added at the end.

summary.span: 針對 控制項，可以指定多個資料欄位。

span.span: For the control, multiple data fields can be specified.

summary.span: 如果 是空屬性，則會在結尾處加入序號，而不是資料欄位值。

span.span: If the property is blank, a sequential number is added at the end instead of a data field value.

summary.span: 各區段是以底線字元 (_) 分隔。

span.span: Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode Static = int32(3)

summary.span: 值設定為 屬性的值。

span.span: The value is set to the value of the property.

summary.span: 如果控制項是命名容器，則對於其包含的所有控制項而言，會用來做為命名容器之階層架構的最上層。

span.span: If the control is a naming container, the control is used as the top of the hierarchy of naming containers for any controls that it contains.
